case.title: American coming to London for a visit - 33 (Arizona)
case.text:
RESPOND WITH YOUR BIRTH MONTH IN THE SUBJECT LINE SO I KNOW YOU ARE REAL!
My name is Chris, I'm 33 and I live in Arizona
I am a super nice guy with all the nicest intentions. Headed to London to visit a buddy of mine. He has a girlfriend and I hate being the 3rd wheel. I'd love to meet a really cool SINGLE girl around my age or younger. This is my second time coming to London. I'm a big Steelers fan and I'm going to the Steelers v Vikings game on Sept 29.
This is my second time in London and I have plenty more trips planned since I'll be working for the airline after the new year. Gimme a chance ha ha.
